api_list.name: advanced

optional_parameters.name: number_of_puzzles
optional_parameters.description: Number of puzzles you will get

optional_parameters.name: theme_search_type
optional_parameters.description: AND: if puzzles need to have all themes;  OR: if puzzles can have either theme

optional_parameters.name: number_of_moves
optional_parameters.description: Total number of moves of the puzzles

api_list.name: range
api_list.description: Get random puzzles within a specified rating range

optional_parameters.name: number_of_puzzles
optional_parameters.description: Number of puzzles you will get

optional_parameters.name: min
optional_parameters.description: Minimum rating the puzzle can have

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Maximum rating the puzzle can have

api_list.name: id
api_list.description: Get  a chess puzzle by its id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Unique id assigned to a certain puzzle

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chess-puzzles2.p.rapidapi.com/id/002VP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chess-puzzles2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chess-puzzles2.p.rapidapi.com/id/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chess-puzzles2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
